Experience
Working

Full Stack Developper, very polyvalent on all steps.

Front-end Development

From back-end of an API to models development, the versatility of my experiences allows me to work at many technical levels in a web application project.

Back-end Development

Responsive design, mobile first, client software optimization, UX fluidity... All of these principles are important to me and require my attention.

System Administration

Designing an application, that's great. Be able to run it in a production environment, it's better ! I love Linux, that's why I enjoy working on servers.

Web Design

Art is something very important to me. And in my opinion, I have to amaze all users who use my applications.

Testimonials

🡐🡒

Téo came to Bristol in 2019 to build our website infrastructure for our British startup. Despite the language barrier, Téo took initiatives and got in touch with our partners to establish the specifications in a meticulous manner before implementing. His professionalism and ease of communication impressed me.

Nicolas Hatton
CEO of The3Million & Settled

I did work with Téo for a project where he was the initiator. He had to bring us his vision throughout the project. During many hours, we were able to freely debate about the software design, Téo knew how to dynamize us and bring solid ideas to enhance the product design. He has a solid development knowledges, unfailing rigor and a very good overall vision of a project. It was a pleasure to work with him.

Amir Lachemet
A2Display developer

I had the opportunity to work with Téo on a project called Arkage. I recommend Téo for his professionalism, his level of expertise and his open-minded look that allow a nice teamwork. I also had the opportunity to work with him on a more complicated and delicate project, his motivation and perseverance also allow us to continue our project despite of the difficulties encountered. I will work with Téo again with pleasure.

Swann Lambard
Inseec Business School student
